message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but feel free to counter-propose if you think it's unfair.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can take 60% and I'll take 40%
Let's try to be reasonable.  I'll take 70% and you can have 30%.  Time is running out and we both need to make a deal.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 50/50. We can both get a decent amount and avoid the risk of getting nothing if we don't make a deal soon.
